text: Need River Murphy for Sportsgirl campaign. Budget around $1,550, looking for 1 x Pinterest pin, 3 x Instagram story, 3 x Instagram story, 2 x 2-minute tutorial, 1 x Press conference. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Need to confirm: deliverables
